mapper.select: SELECT CD AS VALUE, CD_NM AS NAME, P_CD AS "GROUP", COMPANY_ID, CD, CD_NM, P_CD, FREE_1, FREE_2, FREE_3, FREE_4, FREE_5, FREE_6, FREE_7, FREE_8, FREE_9, ICON_CLS, COMMENTS AS COMMENTS, COMMENTS_TITLE AS COMMENTS_TITLE FROM ( SELECT COMPANY_ID, CD, CD_NM, PARAMETER, P_CD, FREE_1, FREE_2, FREE_3, FREE_4, FREE_5, FREE_6, FREE_7, FREE_8, FREE_9, ICON_CLS, COMMENTS AS COMMENTS, COMMENTS_TITLE AS COMMENTS_TITLE, SORT_NUM FROM HO_T_SYS_CODE_P WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT COMPANY_ID, CD, CD_NM, '' PARAMETER, P_CD, FREE_1, FREE_2, FREE_3, FREE_4, FREE_5, FREE_6, FREE_7, FREE_8, FREE_9, ICON_CLS, COMMENTS AS COMMENTS, COMMENTS_TITLE AS COMMENTS_TITLE, SORT_NUM FROM HO_T_SYS_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'AA' AS COMPANY_CD, '1' CODE, '김일1' AS CODE_NM, '' PARAMETER, 'TUTOR_SEQ' AS P_CD, '' FREE_1, '' FREE_2, '' FREE_3, '' FREE_4, '' FREE_5, '' FREE_6, '' FREE_7, '' FREE_8, '' FREE_9, '' AS ICON_CLS, '' AS COMMENTS, '' AS COMMENTS_TITLE, NULL AS SORT_NUM FROM DUAL ) ORDER BY P_CD, SORT_NUM, CD_NM
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM HO_T_SYS_CODE TSC WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT TSC.COMPANY_ID , TSC.CD , TSC.CD_NM , TSC.PARAMETER , TSC.P_CD , TSC.FREE_1 , TSC.FREE_2 , TSC.FREE_3 , TSC.FREE_4 , TSC.FREE_5 , TSC.FREE_6 , TSC.FREE_7 , TSC.FREE_8 , TSC.FREE_9 , TSC.USE_YN , TSC.COMMENTS_TITLE , TSC.COMMENTS , TSC.SORT_NUM , TSC.ICON_CLS FROM HO_T_SYS_CODE_P TSC WHERE 1 = 1
UNION ALL SELECT TSC.COMPANY_ID , TSC.CD , TSC.CD_NM , '' AS PARAMETER , TSC.P_CD , TSC.FREE_1 , TSC.FREE_2 , TSC.FREE_3 , TSC.FREE_4 , TSC.FREE_5 , TSC.FREE_6 , TSC.FREE_7 , TSC.FREE_8 , TSC.FREE_9 , TSC.USE_YN , TSC.COMMENTS_TITLE , TSC.COMMENTS , TSC.SORT_NUM , TSC.ICON_CLS FROM HO_T_SYS_CODE TSC WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM HO_T_SYS_CODE TSC WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.CD LIKE #{CODE}||'%'

SELECT TSC.COMPANY_ID , TSC.CD , TSC.CD AS ID , TSC.CD_NM , TSC.CD_NM AS TEXT , TSC.PARAMETER , TSC.P_CD , TSC.P_CD AS P_ID , TSC.FREE_1 , TSC.FREE_2 , TSC.FREE_3 , TSC.FREE_4 , TSC.FREE_5 , TSC.FREE_6 , TSC.FREE_7 , TSC.FREE_8 , TSC.FREE_9 , TSC.USE_YN , TSC.COMMENTS_TITLE , TSC.COMMENTS , TSC.SORT_NUM , TSC.ICON_CLS FROM HO_T_SYS_CODE_P TSC WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( TSC.CD = #{CODE} OR TSC.CD = (SELECT P_CD FROM HO_T_SYS_CODE_P WHERE CD = #{CODE} )) UNION ALL SELECT TSC.COMPANY_ID , TSC.CD , TSC.CD AS ID , TSC.CD_NM , TSC.CD_NM AS TEXT , '' AS PARAMETER , TSC.P_CD , TSC.P_CD AS P_ID , TSC.FREE_1 , TSC.FREE_2 , TSC.FREE_3 , TSC.FREE_4 , TSC.FREE_5 , TSC.FREE_6 , TSC.FREE_7 , TSC.FREE_8 , TSC.FREE_9 , TSC.USE_YN , TSC.COMMENTS_TITLE , TSC.COMMENTS , TSC.SORT_NUM , TSC.ICON_CLS FROM HO_T_SYS_CODE TSC WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.P_CD = #{CODE}

SELECT SCI.TABLE_NAME AS UP_CD ,SCI.COLUMN_ID ,SCI.COLUMN_NAME AS CODE ,SCI.COLUMN_TITLE ,SCI.DATA_LENGTH AS SCALE ,SCI.MIN_VALUE ,SCI.MAX_VALUE ,SCI.DATA_TYPE ,SCI.PK_IDX ,SCI.NOTNULL_YN ,SCI.CODE ,SCI.CODE_COLUMN ,SCI.DATA_DEFAULT ,SCI.SUB_QUERY FROM HO_T_SYS_COLUMN_INFO SCI

SELECT COLUMN_NAME, CODE, CODE_COLUMN AS CODE_COLUMN_NAME FROM HO_T_SYS_COLUMN_INFO WHERE CODE IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'CASE_CD' AS COLUMN_NAME , 'B10' AS UP_CD, NVL(NULL, 'CODE_NM') AS CODE_COLUMN FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'TYPE_CD' AS COLUMN_NAME , 'B30' AS UP_CD, NVL(NULL, 'CODE_NM') AS CODE_COLUMN FROM DUAL

SELECT AUTH_ID AS VALUE, AUTH_NM AS NAME, '' AS "GROUP", '0000' AS COMPANY_ID, AUTH_ID AS CD, AUTH_NM AS CD_NM, '' AS P_CD, '' AS FREE_1, '' AS FREE_2, '' AS FREE_3, '' AS FREE_4, '' AS FREE_5, '' AS FREE_6, '' AS FREE_7, '' AS FREE_8, '' AS FREE_9, '' AS ICON_CLS, '' AS COMMENTS, '' AS COMMENTS_TITLE FROM HO_T_SYS_AUTH TSA WHERE 1=1
